page.title: 12A Mackie Academy School Day
page.content:
there is registration, the newsletter is read out with all information about clubs, meetings, rules, trips, dental appointments, nurse checks, items lost/found etc.From 13:55 to 15:55 there are 6*20 modules of lessons.A typical timetable for a fourth year pupil (15/16 years old) would include:
English,Maths,Arithmetic,Physics or Chemistry or biology (possibly two of these) Geography, History, Modern Sudies (possibly two of these); French, German or Latin; a technical subject (Woodwork/Metalwork) or home economics (cookery/Fabric and Fashion) ; Games; Physical Education; Interest (Hobby) and a small amount of Music, Religious education and Social education.
